<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform additional validation. Verify that the number of arguments matches</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the number of replacement indices and that there are no holes in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When validation fails, return an array of replacement items that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// validation is enabled in release mode).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
